summary: As of Dec. 4, you can snag an HP DeskJet wireless all-in-one color inkjet printer, scanner, and copier for just $59.99 at Amazon.

title: This MoviePass Black Friday deal is still available
content: As of Dec. 4, get a year of MoviePass for 25% off or a month for 50% off, which is the brand's Black Friday deal that's still live.

title: This might be your last chance to grab the Fitbit Charge 6 at its Cyber Monday price
content: As of Dec. 4, you can snag a Fitbit Charge 6 for just $99.95. That's 38% off the list price and a savings of $60.
